director.name: 伊夫·蒙玛耶尔 Yves Montmayeur

this_title: Kaidan. Strange Stories of Japanese Ghosts
introduction: A journey through the most disturbing Japanese folklore accompanied by some of the leading figures in Japanese horror, including Kiyoshi Kurosawa and Junji Ito, among others. These unique guides will lead us through spaces as diverse as the urban labyrinth of Tokyo or the leafy depths of an enchanted forest, showing us the stages of a mythology that is thousands of years old but still very much alive today.
chinese_title: Kaidan. Strange Stories of Japanese Ghosts
